comment._content: As seen on the Queen's Road.   The sloping street in the middle is the then Ice House Street.

comment.author: 61013804@N08
comment._content: We still see this junction today: curving in the foreground is Queen's Road Central. The sloping street in the centre is Ice House Street as Clarence said. Just visible behind the 2 people is the gentle sloping Battery Path going up to the present Court of Final Appeal. Still visible because people in HK fought to preserve the West Wing of Central Govt Offices which is at this corner.
